root.name: Family Feud & Friends
root.description: OverviewFamily Feud Friends is a game show game developed and published by Ludia, Inc. for the iPhone, iPad and Android platforms. Family Feud Friends is based on the TV game show of the same name.Family Feud Friends is the first game released in the " Friends" line of games.

similar_games.game: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader? & Friends
